front.title: DTN Scope Control using Hop Limits (SCHL)

abstract.t: This document defines DTN Scope Control using Hop Limits (SCHL), aDTN Bundle Protocol extension block. The SCHL extension block holdsthe number of DTN hops a bundle has traversed while being forwarded(count sub-field) and a maximum hop limit value set by the bundlesender (limit sub-field). DTN nodes increment the count sub-fieldwhen forwarding a bundle and discard bundles that have traveled atleast the number of hops specified in the limit sub-field. This memoalso reserves the value 9 for the SCHL extension block type value andbundle status reason code in RFC 5050.
